info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Alexander and northwestern Iredell Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Taylorsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Statesville, Stony Point, Love Valley, Lookout Shoals Lake, Bethlehem, Lake Hickory, Hiddenite, Little River In Alexander County and Millersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
